data.name: Clover Aligned to NCBI Taxonomy using JL library
data.body:
Data can be found [here](https://github.com/viralemergence/virion?tab=readme-ov-file#download-links)

## What's Changed
* Deindex globi by @casanchez in https://github.com/viralemergence/virion/pull/86
* use current ICTV msl by @collinschwantes in https://github.com/viralemergence/virion/pull/116
* julia deps graceful fail by @collinschwantes in https://github.com/viralemergence/virion/pull/118
* pipeline runs with targets and renv using the rocker/verse container by @collinschwantes in https://github.com/viralemergence/virion/pull/107
* adding clover ncbi taxonomy integration by @collinschwantes in https://github.com/viralemergence/virion/pull/121
* Fix/GitHub pages by @collinschwantes in https://github.com/viralemergence/virion/pull/123

## New Contributors
* @casanchez made their first contribution in https://github.com/viralemergence/virion/pull/86
* @cjcarlson made their first contribution in https://github.com/viralemergence/virion/pull/89
* @collinschwantes made their first contribution in https://github.com/viralemergence/virion/pull/101

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/viralemergence/virion/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1
